#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long 
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define MAX 405
#define M 1000003
using namespace std;


int main ()
{
	int a=0,b=0,c=0,d=0;
	string s;
	cin>>s;
	if(s.length()>=5)d=1;
	for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)
	{
		if(s[i]>='0' && s[i]<='9')
		{
			a=1;
		}
		if(s[i]>='a' && s[i]<='z')
		{
			b=1;
		}
		if(s[i]>='A' && s[i]<='Z')
		{
			c=1;
		}
	}
	if(a&&b&&c&&d)
	{
		printf("YES\n");
	}
	else
	{
		printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
